      • onCreatureSpawn

        protected void onCreatureSpawn(org.bukkit.event.entity.CreatureSpawnEvent e)
        Handles entity spawns, checking to ensure the spawn occurred in a supported World, not inside a WG exemption region, and inside a defined Zone. The entity's current custom name is stored in metadata via EntityMeta so that entities spawned with custom names don't lose those names.
        Parameters:
        e - the CreatureSpawnEvent.

      • onPlayerDeath

        protected void onPlayerDeath(org.bukkit.event.entity.PlayerDeathEvent e)
        Colorizes death messages in chat.
        Parameters:
        e - the PlayerDeathEvent.

        Parameters:

      • onEntityDamage

        protected void onEntityDamage(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent e)

        Parameters:
        e - the EntityDamageEvent.
